name: Golden Arches
description:
In a newly gentrified area, it is your goal to navigate the stresses of life and a second job as a barista at a local cafe. Play as Aaron, trying to balance your health with your pocket. Will you make rent or be forced to leave?  

Unsupported browsers: Safari (visual and audio bugs)

 If run in Safari some images and sounds play not load such as:

  • Title Menu
  • Day 2 and 3 music
  • Slower image loading times

Chrome, Firefox, Brave, etc suggested.
